A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I am not a bot.  I actually wasn't even going to leave a review\, but after reading page after page of reviews on Rotten Tomatoes\, I have to wonder if they are skewing the results of what people are rating this movie. 

The majority - by a lot- of reviews that I read give this movie less than 2.5 stars.  Yet\, the audience score does not seem to change despite the overwhelmingly bad reviews.  

We know the critics were bought\, were you too RT??

PS - this movie deserves 0 stars.
